channel.title: How to edit sprites in a 508?~?
channel.description: Okay so I have relized that the only way to edit the sprites is that you override them in the chache. To do this you have to make a new "sprites folder" and have a DAT file and a IDX file in there with those you must edit to the picture you want but I have no idea how. Any one know of a program out there that might be able to do this? Or if you know how to do it your self. Thanks

item.title: How to edit sprites in a 508?~?
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

There is a tutorial on 508 custom sprites scattered somewhere around this economy, i think it’s made by laz.to edit it you need a sprite unpacker/editor or you can just make your own sprites with a sprite maker that can be found in this tutorial here… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=354214.0

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit sprites in a 508?~?

item.title: How to edit sprites in a 508?~?
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

Okay so I have relized that the only way to edit the sprites is that you override them in the chache. To do this you have to make a new “sprites folder” and have a DAT file and a IDX file in there with those you must edit to the picture you want but I have no idea how. Any one know of a program out there that might be able to do this? Or if you know how to do it your self. Thanks
